text: Solway Community Technology College is a mixed secondary school located in Silloth in the English county of Cumbria.http://www.solway.cumbria.sch.uk/ It is a comprehensive community school administered by Cumbria County Council. Solway Community Technology College offers GCSEs and vocational courses as programmes of study for pupils. ==References== ==External links== *Solway Community Technology College official website Category:Secondary schools in Cumbria Category:Community schools in Cumbria Category:Silloth
title: Solway Community Technology College
